alert.note: Alert for Bee; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 10:04PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LIVE OAK AND NORTHWESTERN BEE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM CST... At 1003 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oakville, or near Three Rivers, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers, Mineral, Tulsita, Karon, Oakville, Pettus, Pawnee, Ray Point, and Tuleta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 63 and 73. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 620. US Highway 181 between mile markers 572 and 580. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
